data.enText: known to be real and genuine and not a copy
I don't know if the painting is authentic.
data.chText: 我不知道这幅画是不是真迹。

data.enText: an authentic account of life in the desert
data.chText: 对沙漠生活的真实描述

data.enText: the authentic voice of young black Americans
data.chText: 年轻美国黑人的真实呼声

data.enText: made to be exactly the same as the original
an authentic model of the ancient town

data.chText: 地道的墨西哥风味菜肴

simple_means.memory_skill: auto- 自己的 + hent- 做 + -ic ...的

example: photographs taken in a veritable bull ring

tr: conforming to fact and therefore worthy of belief
example: an authentic account by an eyewitness

example.ex: She has authentic charm whereas most people simply have nice manners...
example.tran: 她散发出真正的魅力，而大多数人只是举止优雅。
它们必须得看上去像真的。

value.def: An authentic person, object, or emotion is genuine.
value.tran: 真的;真正的;真实的;真诚的

example.ex: There are factors, however, that have cast doubt on the statue's authenticity.
example.tran: 然而，有些因素让人对该雕塑的真伪产生了怀疑。

example.ex: Consumers are increasingly interested in the authentically exotic tastes...
example.tran: 消费者对于真正的异国风味越来越情有独钟。

example.ex: The enamel gives new brass an authentically tarnished finish.
example.tran: 用瓷釉作末道漆使新的黄铜器看似自然地失去了光泽。
制造仿潮流服装所用的图案

value.def: If you describe something as authentic, you mean that it is such a good imitation that it is almost the same as or as good as the original.
value.tran: （仿制品）能够以假乱真的，逼真的

example.ex: The team decided to try and replicate the missing curtains as authentically as possible.
example.tran: 小组决定尽可能照原样重新制作丢失的幕帘。

example.ex: I had obtained the authentic details about the birth of the organization.
example.tran: 我已经掌握了有关该组织诞生的可靠的详细资料。

value.def: An authentic piece of information or account of something is reliable and accurate.
value.tran: (信息或记述）准确的，可靠的，可信的

example.ex: The book authentically and intimately describes the small details of her daily life.
example.tran: 本书翔实地记述了她日常生活中的小细节。

example.ex: The film's authenticity of detail has impressed critics.
example.tran: 电影在细节上的真实性给影评人士留下了深刻的印象。

partsOfSpeech.dec: auto- 自己的 + mat 动 + -ic ...的
auto- 自己的 + mat 动 + -ic ...的

partsOfSpeech.d: 学术的(与实践性、技术性相对)

partsOfSpeech.dec: democrat n. 民主主义者 + -ic ...的
dom 房屋,控制 + est n.自我提高训练法 + -ic ...的
syn- 共同,相同 + thet- 放置 + -ic ...的
ec- 向外 + centr 中心 + -ic ...的

partsOfSpeech.d: 悲惨的，不幸的 ，可悲的，悲痛的

partsOfSpeech.dec: ana- 分开 + lyt- 裂开,分解,溶解 + -ic ...的
super- 超过 + son 声音 + -ic ...的
